titleStmt.title: A preparation for Christmass, or The pious soul sighing out a oblation of praise and wonder on that miracle of divine love the incarnation of her saviour. To which is added a hymn on the same occasion. R.B.
titleStmt.author: R. B.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for G. Widdows at the Green Dragon in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original at the Lambeth Palace Library, London.

place.placeName: the Green Dragon in St. Paul's Church-Yard
